about_the_game:
Nordstrums Treasure is a game about lust, love and adventure. Meet beautiful women, find hidden treasure and discover the truth behind the islands lost fortune.

The Story:
The story follows our unlikely hero, Daniel, who having just turned 18, receives a gift from his landlady, a one-week vacation on an exotic island. While on the island, you bump into Ava, an 18-year-old student on holiday with her Mother. After spending some time in the sun, Ava asks if you want to go explore the island a little, which leads you to a mysterious cave. This is where your adventure begins!

Content:
  • 2,000+ Renders
  • 80,000+ Words
  • 25+ Animations
*These may be subject to change as more may be added before the final release*

Gameplay:
  • Define Your Own Relationships
  • Steam Achievements
  • Full Music/Audio System
  • Story Altering Choices
  • Compelling Story
  • Multiple Love Interests
  • Much More...

content_descriptors.notes: The game has images and descriptive sex of an adult nature. Included but not limited to full sex scenes. Please only play if you are 18+ ( or however old your country deems an adult to be. )

legal_notice:
All characters are 18 age or older

This game contains violence, obscene scenes (naked girls and flirting scenes with sexual overtones, sex scenes), Rude humor, blood, or infrequent use of profanity.
All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Nordstrums Treasure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, NVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: For his 18th birthday, the main characters' "landlady", Melissa decided to treat her "tenant" to a vacation on an exotic island. Little did they know, this vacation would change their lives forever. The game is filled with love, lust, and wonder.
